[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/rjaz79O.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Out With the DOGE, in With the BCH[/color][/b]
With a thread in the Rules, Announcements, News, and Feedback section, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] announced that Dogecoin will no longer be accepted for site transactions. This also means the immediate suspension of the purchasable Dogecoinage award. In Dogecoin's place, support for Bitcoin Cash was revealed. The fork of Bitcoin can now be used for all site transactions. Lastly, the BTCash award was revealed and can only be obtained by donating $50 worth of Bitcoin Cash. Those interested may do so [url=https://hackforums.net/buyawards.php]here[/url].[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5764843]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]No More Notification Delays[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] created a short thread announcing he had applied a fix for a MyBB bug that had caused large delays in both private message and email notifications. According to our admin, it should now take no longer than ten minutes to receive any notifications you are due.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5765760] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5765760][color=#FFFFFF]Email and PM Notification Delays[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
For awhile since the latest forum upgrade, MyBB had a bug that would send PM's/emails at a delay. This issue has now been addressed and fixed.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5764843][color=#FFFFFF]Doge Gone, BCH Added[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
The Doge award has been removed from the donation list and discontinued, the Bitcoin Cash award has been added.
[/list]
